div.p: Our new gifted program, Journey, at Mountain Trail Middle School engages students in an adaptive learning environment where students are active participants in reaching their academic potential. Submit your application online at: https://bit.ly/2VFE2VJ

Superintendent Dr. Jesse Welsh's message to families provides updates on potential refunds for field trips and activities, assistance available from the Paradise Valley Emergency Food Bank, and fourth-quarter grading guidelines.

Beginning Monday, April 13, hours for our meal distribution sites will change to 8 a.m. to 10 a.m. in order to help our families balance distance learning schedules. Also starting Monday, families will be able to pick-up free meals without having children accompany them. Families will need to present student school-issued IDs, report cards, or answer verifying questions such as student’s name, date of birth, or student ID number.

District Administrative Center
15002 N. 32nd St.
Phoenix, AZ 85032 (Get directions)
